tickets.title: Unit Test Suite
tickets.deferred_reason: Achieved 83% coverage (288 passing tests). Remaining 7% gap consists of defensive exception handlers in command modules that would require complex mocking scenarios with diminishing returns. All critical paths covered: client (98%), config (96%), formatters (97%), main (97%). Core acceptance criteria met: 95%+ JSON-RPC client, 95%+ config management, 90%+ formatters, all mock-based tests, pytest fixtures, coverage reporting. Recommend deferring additional exception path testing until integration testing phase where these paths can be tested more naturally.

state_history.note: All acceptance criteria met: 114 tests passing, all patterns tested, streams tested, graph algorithms validated

tickets.notes:
Pydantic models must use Python 3.12+ modern typing:

- Built-in generics: `list[int]`, `dict[str, Any]`
- Union operator: `int | None` instead of `Optional[int]`
- Strict validation for all COMPASS metrics

tickets.title: Memory Service (Hybrid: Mem0 + COMPASS + Graph)
tickets.notes:
Hybrid architecture implementation combining:
- Four-layer memory (Working/Episodic/Semantic/Procedural)
- COMPASS stage-aware compression
- Neo4j graph database for entity relationships
- ECL Pipeline (Extract, Cognify, Load)
- Memify graph optimization
- Hybrid search (Qdrant + Neo4j)

Targets:
- 60-80% context efficiency
- 20% long-horizon task improvement
- <200ms graph traversal, <300ms hybrid search
- 80%+ entity extraction, 75%+ relationship detection

---

tickets.title: Multi-Provider LLM Client Service Implementation
tickets.notes:
This is a foundational service for AgentCore that enables all agent operations requiring LLM capabilities. Priority P0 as Phase 1 component.

**Key Strategic Value:**
- Reduces vendor lock-in through provider abstraction
- Enables 30% cost reduction through intelligent model selection
- Provides A2A protocol-native LLM operations with distributed tracing
- Foundation for future intelligent agent capabilities

---

*Created: 2025-10-24T22:47:19.602397+00:00*
*Updated: 2025-10-24T22:47:19.602397+00:00*

tickets.title: Unit Test Suite
tickets.notes: Added 229 unit tests covering core LLM Gateway modules. Coverage: 87-100% for exceptions, models, config, provider, registry, cache_service. All 354 tests passing (353 passed, 1 skipped).

tickets.title: Integration Tests
tickets.notes: Added 16 integration tests for cache_service (L1/L2 caching, eviction, performance). Expanded total integration test count from 275 to 291 tests.

tickets.title: Performance Benchmarks
tickets.notes: Added 15 comprehensive pytest-benchmark tests covering L1Cache, CacheService, ProviderRegistry, and CacheKey operations. All benchmarks passing with performance targets met: L1 cache <1ms, cache service lookup <2ms, provider operations <2ms.

tickets.title: Provider SDK Version Pinning
tickets.notes: Provider SDK versions pinned in pyproject.toml: openai==1.54.0, anthropic==0.40.0, google-generativeai==0.8.3. Implementation verified.

tickets.title: Governance Audit Logging
tickets.notes: Governance audit logging implemented with comprehensive Prometheus metrics, structured logging, and compliance reporting. Implementation verified with tests passing.

tickets.title: Rate Limit Handling
tickets.notes: Rate limit handling already implemented in commit 813ce54. Verified RateLimitError exception, retry logic, and exponential backoff. All 14 rate limit tests passing.

tickets.title: Coordination Service with REP Implementation
tickets.notes:
Phase 3 component that enhances existing MessageRouter with intelligent coordination. Can be implemented independently but provides most value after LLM-001 and memory service are operational. Priority P1 as enhancement rather than foundational requirement.

**Performance Targets**:
- Signal registration: <5ms (p95)
- Routing score retrieval: <2ms (p95)
- Optimal agent selection: <10ms for 100 candidates (p95)
- Support 1,000 agents with coordination states
- Handle 10,000 signals per second

**Plan Reference**: `docs/specs/coordination-service/plan.md`

---

tickets.title: Implement Memify Graph Optimizer
tickets.notes:
Implement Memify operation for graph optimization (consolidation, pruning, pattern detection)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Entity consolidation: Merge similar entities with >90% similarity
- [ ] Relationship pruning: Remove low-value edges (access count < 2)
- [ ] Pattern detection: Identify frequently traversed paths
- [ ] Index optimization: Update Neo4j indexes based on query patterns
- [ ] Quality metrics: Track connectivity, relationship density
- [ ] <5s optimization per 1000 entities
- [ ] 90%+ consolidation accuracy
- [ ] <5% duplicate entities after optimization
- [ ] Scheduled execution support (cron)
- [ ] Unit tests for algorithms

**Context:**
- Specs: docs/specs/memory-service/spec.md (Hybrid Architecture)

- Tasks: docs/specs/memory-service/tasks.md
